Getting started

Installation:

The main requirements are FEniCSx, beyond the typical numpy, scipy, etc requirements. For cross-sectional analysis, a python wrapped implementation of a sparse QR decomposition is used which can be installed from PyPi Usage of a conda (or for even faster installation, mamba) enviroment is recommended.

First, install the package dependencies. Then clone the repository and pip install:

  1. Install Numpy and SciPy

  2. Install FEniCS and pyvista for visualization

  3. Install sparseqr

  4. run git clone https://github.com/jkrokowski/ALBATROSS.git

  5. From the top level ALBATROSS directory, run pip install .

A Simple Example

Run ex1_cantilever_beam.py here
